name: Bubble Pop (itch) (Cake, ThePibbster, silvia :3)
description:
Bubble Pop is a unique 2d platformer in which you blow bubbles to bounce you to reach new heights and travel further. You play as Harold, a trans girl, who is trying to save animals from their bubble imprisonments. Have fun!

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

Z or / + Move to Shoot Bubbles in any direction

Game made by:

Cake and ThePibbster, with art by silvia
